entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 07:06 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 07:06 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the morning then rising.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:06 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
